title: The effect of antiarrhythmic medications on the risk of cardiovascular outcomes in patients with atrial fibrillation and coronary artery disease
authors: Shih-Rong Wang, Kuan-Chih Huang, Ting-Tse Lin, Shu-Lin Chuang, Yen-Yun Yang, Cho-Kai Wu, Lian-Yu Lin
reference: Wang, S.-R., Huang, K.-C., Lin, T.-T., Chuang, S.-L., Yang, Y.-Y., Wu, C.-K., & Lin, L.-Y. (2024).
